hero.title: Sofa, Curtain & Upholstery Cleaning Service
hero.subtitle: Restore your sofa, curtains, and car seats with our professional on-site cleaning service for your home or condo. We eliminate deep-seated stains, dust mites, and odors.

cards.title: Deep Cleaning to the Fiber
cards.description: We use specialized equipment for sofas, curtains, and carpets to thoroughly remove stubborn stains and dust mites hidden deep within the fibers.

cards.title: Safe, Residue-Free
cards.description: Our imported cleaning solutions are certified safe for children and pets, and are environmentally friendly.

cards.title: At-Your-Doorstep Service
cards.description: No need to move your furniture. Our team provides on-site cleaning services at your home, condo, or office in Bangkok and its vicinity.

faqData.question: How long does it take to clean a sofa?
faqData.answer: Generally, cleaning a 2-3 seater sofa takes about 1-2 hours, depending on the fabric type and the severity of the stains.

faqData.question: How long does it take for curtains or sofas to dry?
faqData.answer: Sofas or curtains will be dry and ready to use within 3-4 hours after cleaning is complete. We recommend using a fan or air conditioner to speed up the drying process.

faqData.question: Is the cleaning solution safe for children and pets?
faqData.answer: Absolutely. We use high-quality, naturally derived cleaning products with no harmful chemical residues, ensuring safety for everyone in your family and your pets.
